alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 12:51AM CDT until April 23 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wichita County in west central Kansas... Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Logan County in west central Kansas... Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1251 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Rexford to 9 miles south of Leoti, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rexford around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Selden. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 41 and 100. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
